title: Portal (Runecrafting)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Runecrafting portals are portals found within various runic altars which allows one-way transportation to its corresponding mysterious ruins in the overworld. Apart from teleports, the portals are the only exit from the altar.

Runecrafting portals are portals found within various runic altars which allows one-way transportation to its corresponding mysterious ruins in the overworld. Apart from teleports, the portals are the only exit from the altar.

v • d • e

'''Runecrafting portals''' are portals found within various [[runic altar]]s which allows one-way transportation to its corresponding [[mysterious ruins]] in the overworld. Apart from teleports, the portals are the only exit from the altar.

{{Runecraft}}
